item.description:
Last year we were lucky enough to have this Meetup scheduled on St. Patty's Day itself, this year we'll have to fake it. But there were limericks written and shared last time, so who knows...anything is possible!

For a little pre-St. Patty's celebration, we are heading to Christopher's in Porter, which has mucho beers on tap and really great burgers. That means I had to make a reservation, which means I had to cap RSVP's, which means everyone needs to RSVP and MEAN it! Oh and you all need to either get dinner or drinks so we'll be welcome back again.

Can't wait to see you there!
item.name: Luck o' the Writing Exercises
